subject: Validate: MELO V2 Phase 3 - Invite System Audit (p3-3-a)

acceptance_criteria: Key question answered: Is invite modal Discord-styled?
Evidence provided for Discord styling claims
content.self_validation_notes: Verified audit report exists and is comprehensive. Confirmed invite modal has Discord hex codes (bg-[#313338], bg-[#5865F2], bg-[#2B2D31]) via grep. All 4 components analyzed with styling status. Build in progress.
